info.title: Eco Mode

ecomode.description: This Resource specifies the supported and currently active Eco Mode of a Device The Resource is a deriviative of the Mode Resource (oic. r. mode) with a restriction that the population of supportedmodes and modes Properties is restricted to the set of values: "disabled","enabled","notsupported". The adminforced Property indicates that the value has been set by another party (e. g. via some offboard Smart Energy interaction)

modes.description: The array of the currently active mode(s).

supportedModes.description: The array of possible modes the device supports.

adminforced.description: The indicator that the current mode of operation has been forced by admin action.
